Experience.Title: Senior Software Engineer
Responsibilities: Work with a number of AWS Services to architect new solutions for customers.
Remediate any issues that come up.

Experience.Title: Software Engineering Specialist & Senior Supervisor
Responsibilities: Served as Software Technical Lead on team creating an ASP.NET Core data-entry web application using C#/.NET, MongoDB, DevExpress, and JavaScript which led to a $3M contract extension.
Lead architectural design of dynamic user configurability for web-application creating UI and backend support.
Stood up multiple functional tests using Selenium and unit/integration tests using MSTest.
Lead customer demos to understand needs of operators and converted feedback into actionable JIRA tickets.
Coordinated with project lead in order to manage JIRA backlog, sprint planning, demos, and retrospectives.
Received multiple recognitions for speed, going above and beyond, and creativity with UI work.
Served as a Campus Brand Manager liaison between the University of Florida and L3 Harris to organize recruiting events and manage staffing.
Acted as Group Lead for department which involves advocating for employees and helping them shape their career paths.

Experience.Title: Software Engineering Senior Associate
Responsibilities: Collaborated in architectural re-design of legacy software application using MagicDraw.
Implemented an MVVM architectural structure working with RabbitMQ to pass data between C#/.NET applications and Python services in order to replace legacy Service Bus architecture.

Created Windows Service to run commands linked to Python scripts; this windows service would interact with our C#/.NET applications and stand up automated Python scripts 80% faster than other C# alternatives.
Used TIBCO and IronPython to create service that gathered data from MySQL databases and embedded hardware; data was formatted into JSON and packaged to be ingested by a proprietary web application.

Updated legacy software to allow hardware chassis to have a variable number of slots for circuit card assemblies. This involved re-mapping of chassis slot registers and updating legacy C++ files to allow for variability.
Created automated test suites using SoapUI and Groovy allowing for the software to be sold-off within schedule; saving budget and time.

Experience.Title: Software Engineering Associate
Responsibilities: Developed front and back end of a custom control test console with PyQT.

Console ingested CSV files and automatically ran tests while monitoring health of embedded hardware. This allowed for unattended hardware testing and reduced a 73-business day test procedure to 14-calendar days.
Updated and maintained embedded software unit tests and ported circuit card assemblies from RHEL to Ubuntu.

Experience.Title: Intern
Responsibilities: Created a Python Script Analyzer app to be used in association with TIBCO and proprietary DLL files; this app assisted developers in creating Iron Python scripts that were compliant with proprietary DLL files. The Python Script Analyzer is still in use by developers today.
